chapters.title: Chapter 4:  A Sense of Humor
chapters.info: Jheran, p. 102 (129)—Clan chief of the Shaarad Aiel. He was formerly Sovin Nai, a Knife Hand. He and Bael finally ended the centuries of blood feud between the Shaarad and Goshien Aiel, which Janduin attempted to stop and Rand finally did.
